singleTweet.author: @nytimes

singleTweet.text: Yoskeili Zurita was one of the passengers on the boat. 16 and hungry, she followed men who had promised her work and food. Instead, they smuggled her out of Venezuela by sea, planning to force her into a Trinidad brothel. https://t.co/xsaegvwZCG https://t.co/fn4lUbgIGk
